comment: I love her so much!!im currently taking her. She talks fast but she is very clear at what she says. Attendance is mandatory but not at the same time. She remembers your face and name by heart. Great lectures and she wants what's best for all her students. She genuinely enjoys teaching and she makes her classes not boring. Highly reccomend

I would take her again if I have the choice. Her lectures are very entertaining. Her exams are easy. The material on it is the same as what she goes over in the lecture. If you attend class, you would pass the class easily. She wants her student to succeed and is willing to give you a study guide that you can use during exams.
I cannot emphasize this enough TAKE HER. Cares about students and you actually learn the material rather than memorization.

Dr. Scherer was a very good and professional teacher for RM. She cares about what she's teaching and very diligent about what she teaches. Very good with helping students about any questions that may arise about her class. I would take her class again.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: EXCELLENT TEACHER. THE WORK DONE IN THE CLASS IS NOT DIFFICULT, AS LONG AS YOU STICK WITH THE EXPECTATIONS LISTED IN THE SYLLABUS. SHE MAKES YOU THINK AND LETS USE UTILIZE YOUR NOTES FOR ASSIGNMENTS AND TESTS. YET, SHE DOES NOT WANT YOU COPYING AND PASTING SHE WANTS YOU TO USE YOUR BRAIN!!! ITS A FUN CLASS

Dr. Scherer is a very upbeat professor who cares a lot about this course. You don't need to buy the book, because the tests are lecture based. It's rare that she posts her lectures online, so you need to go to class and write notes in order to pass. Her tests do have essay portions, but they are fairly easy if you study what's on the study guide.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: I wish I could take this online class again! Dr. Scherer made the content so interesting and easy to understand. Her quizzes are not difficult as long as you know the material. All lectures are YouTube videos with lecture companions. Between those and the book, quizzes/exams were a piece of cake. She also does a bonus assignment in each module!

Dr. Scherer is an awesome professor, she's very passionate about the course material & always in a great mood. The group project is a super easy A and the papers are not difficult either. Her exams are essays but she always gives partial credit. If you go to class & take notes you should make an A. The course material is easy to understand.

Dr. Scherer is very dynamic and funny, easy to keep up with the lectures. Her tests are all essay answers but there were never any surprises. You MUST come to class and take notes though, she doesn't post powerpoints. There is a study guide but it wont make sense if you miss lecture. She is a tough grader though, BE THOROUGH!!!! Overall Fantastic!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: By far one of the best professors I've ever taken. She enjoys teaching and is always in a good mood. Fun class and would take her for every class if possible!

Great professor and all-around nice person. I took this professor for a four-week-long summer online course and was worried, but she made all of the assignments very clear and organized. It is a lot of work in that span of time, but very doable. Dr. Scherer provides great feedback and is very accessible. I would definitely take her again!

I love Dr. Scherer! She made this online class, CRJU 3310, so easy and enjoyable! She is definitely a professor that loves teaching and the subject matter. There are weekly quizzes and discussions, two exams, one assignment, and one research paper. All easy if you take the time and are prepared. LOVE HER LECTURE VIDEOS! I would take her again!

Dr. Scherer is a great teacher. She made a dry subject interesting and I learned how to write in APA format correctly because of her. If you need help, just ask and she will be there for you. If you take the class seriously, she will take you seriously. You can't expect her to feel bad for the ones who do not attempt to try.

Dr. Scherer is an amazing professor! I took the class during a 4-week summer term and it was a great class. She is brilliant and very straight forward and what you need to know for the exams. 2 short papers, 2 tests and a group project(which she gives class time to work on). If you pay attention in class and study the PPTs you will do well.

If there were a such thing as "professor-zilla" it would be Heidi Scherer. The absolute worst professor I have ever taken, unreasonable, unorganized & annoying. Forget talking to her about concernsissues, its pointless & you'll get a BS answer that makes you think your not worth her breathe. RM is already a hard course, she only makes it worse.

I've never been more frustrated with an online class. It's not too hard, and she grades pretty easily, but it's far too much work for an online class. 8-10 page paper due at end. Weekly quizzesdiscussions. Although it was online you NEED the book to pass. She seems nice and all, but for online it sucked. More work than was necessary for the class.

Dr. Scherer is not the professor to take for the Serial Offender class if you are looking for an applied course.  She teaches pretty much criminology and her course is all theory.  Was a let down for me and extremely boring.  Wish I had taken Crowder like suggested in another persons rating.  Save yourself and take Crowder - way more interesting!
She is an excellent teacher. 2 papers 4 tests and 2 quizes all are straightforward from the notes and she give great study guides. Take her, you will learn alot and enjoy the class!

Dr. Scherer- definitely one of the best professors I've ever had! Super nice! Definitely willing to work with you,jeopardy review before tests, brings candy, easy understandable assignments, tests are exactly what she says they will be. Awesome personality and definitely the professor you should take for this class! LOVED her! Def taking her again!

I was looking forward to class and realized it was a huge disappointment!  Her tests are ridiculous & she grades too hard.  I dropped the class after 1st test (I NEVER received a D in any class ever).  Says she will work w/ you but I didn't want to spend entire semester stressed about the boring content.  Take this course w/ Dr. Crowder instead!
Talks really fast but is an understanding professor. Had a hard time keeping up because it was a month long summer course. Too difficult for that short amount of time

Dr Scherer is very personable, but the course itself (Profile of a Serial Offender) was exremely dissapointing. She doesnt make it interesting and I found it to be dull. I love CJ but she really made me dred going to her class. Tests were never over what the study guide was, and she grades way to harsh. I am an A student but I made C's on all tests

Professor Scherer is so awesome. She really cares about Criminal Justice and it shows. Very funny and interesting. The class itself was very engaging and the material was well presented. Tests were a little hard, but she has a review day for each exam... and you get candy! *Highly* recommended!!
TAKE HER!!!! She is passionate about her work!! And she is very helpful. Study the study guide that is your test!!! One of the best professor at KSU!!

Dr. Scherer is one of the best professors I have ever had. She's very helpful and understanding. It's actually very easy to make an A in this class if you even try a little bit, but you also learn a lot from her class. Her lectures were always very funny and interesting. I'd take her again in a heartbeat, and you should too!

Dr. Scherer is amazing! If you are going to miss class for a legitimate reason, let her know and if you miss something important she'll work with you to make them up. Pay attention and you'll be fine. 3 tests, 2 one page writing assignments, and 2 "pop" (she usually hints at them) quizzes from the book, so read it.

Her class is pretty straightforward. Her PPs are based on the text, and you'll get a "pop" quiz a few times a semester; book was helpful in that regard. She docks points for more than 2 classes missed. Didn't seem prepared to answer a lot of in-depth questions, though, and she could be a little condescending to her students in class.

I loved taking this class with her! Dr. Scherer really enjoys what she talks about. She wants her students to understand and be interested in what she's teaching. I plan to take her again in the Spring for Criminology! Her tests are short answer but not super hard if you attend class. The group project is very interesting and easy. Take her!!

She is GREAT! Her class is so easy. I actually never wanted to skip her class it was very interesting. We just took notes off a powerpoint and that was all that was on the test. If you can copy notes and pay attention, you will pass this class easily. DEFINANTLY reccomend her!

Really nice. Serious about what she teaches. 3 Tests: Multiple choice, Fill in the blank, Short Answer.  Tests were a little complicated. Two reading pop-quizzes throughout the semester. Takes attendance. Teaches from power points that she doesn't normally post online.  I'm not a CJ major so it was boring and more difficult than should have been.
She lectures from her powerpoints and passes a roll sheet around everyday. Always provided a study guide for her tests. If you go to class and take notes, you should get an A.
Overall good experience. If you can take good notes its easy. Power point is from the book and is exactly whats on the test.
Very routine-she talks off slides and you need to be there everyday to get notes from slides because that is exactly what's on the test. Overall very easy and she is a good teacher.

Heidi Scherer is the most useless teacher I have ever experienced. She prides herself on having a Doctorate in Criminology yet has no work experience in the criminal justice field. She knows nothing about laws, crime, or the CJ field as a whole. She will tell you one thing to your face and then lie and say she never said it later. Useless.
